keys: la grande théorie du Big Bang

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Théorie du Big Bang</string>
            <string language="en">Big bang theory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grosse Knalltheorie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teoria grande do estrondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teoria grande di scoppio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θεωρία μεγάλου κτυπήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Teoría grande de la explosión</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Troisième sur trois illustrations montrant les principes de la théorie du Big Bang. L'explosion a fait en sorte que l'apesanteur maintiennent la matière ensemble dans quelques endroits pour créer  des galaxies d'étoiles.</string>
            <string language="en">Third of three illustrations showing the principles of the big bang theory. The explosion made the gravity pull the matter together in some places to create galaxies of stars.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la grande théorie du Big Bang</string>
            <string language="en">big bang theory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">explosions</string>
            <string language="en">explosions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">galaxies</string>
            <string language="en">galaxies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pesanteur</string>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">matière</string>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoiles</string>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">univers</string>
            <string language="en">Universe</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von drei Abbildungen, welche die 
Grundregeln der grossen Knalltheorie zeigen. Die Explosion ließ
den Schwerkraftzug den Stoff zusammen in einigen Plätzen Galaxien der
Sterne herstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third de três ilustrações que mostram os 
princípios da teoria grande do estrondo. A explosão fêz à 
tração da gravidade a matéria junto em alguns lugares para criar 
galáxias das estrelas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano i 
principii della teoria grande di scoppio. L'esplosione ha reso 
al tiro di gravità la materia insieme in alcuni posti per creare le 
galassie delle stelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τις αρχές της
θεωρίας μεγάλου κτυπήματος. Η έκρηξη έκανε το τράβηγμα 
βαρύτητας το θέμα μαζί σε ισχύ μερικές για να δημιουργήσει τους 
γαλαξίες των αστεριών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero de tres ilustraciones que muestran los 
principios de la teoría grande de la explosión. La explosión 
hizo el tirón de la gravedad la materia junta en algunos lugares para
crear galaxias de estrellas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">grosse Knalltheorie</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Explosionen</string>
          </keyword>
